txt.en:
Each profession has a set of tools that are necessary to create recipes or use specialized skills associated with the profession. These tools can be purchased from novices and experts associated with the different professions, from suppliers, traded with other players, or found in the auction hall.

As you progress in a given profession, you should consider upgrading your tools to receive the benefits that they offer.

If you find that there are no tools to be found in the auction hall or from other players, you can always check the LOTRO Store.

<rgb=#FF00FF00>Note: Remember to equip your tools or you will not be able to execute any recipes associated with that profession.</rgb>
